meanings.definition: The act of fastening or securing with a garter.
meanings.sent1: She ensured the gartering of her stockings before the event.
meanings.sent2: In the past, gartering was essential to hold up socks.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the character comically struggled with gartering his pants.
meanings.sent4: The gartering of memories kept them secure in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The gartering of the rope made the climb safer.

meanings.definition: The practice of wearing a garter as a fashion accessory.
meanings.sent1: At the ball, she flaunted her gartering with pride.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, gartering is a symbol of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured unique gartering designs.
meanings.sent4: Her gartering style was as bold as her personality.
meanings.sent5: The gartering added a touch of glamour to her outfit.

meanings.definition: The process of gathering or bunching fabric with a garter.
meanings.sent1: The gartering of the curtains created a lovely draping effect.
meanings.sent2: During sewing class, they learned the art of gartering fabric.
meanings.sent3: The gartering of the tablecloth gave it a fancy look.
meanings.sent4: She was skilled in the delicate gartering of lace.
meanings.sent5: The gartering of the fabric added texture to the dress.
